On 17 May 2010 07:08, Ken <kstanley@...> wrote:
>
>
> In fact, there is a solution to the no-velocity version that has only a single hidden neuron. In
> fact, there is a solution with no hidden neurons (which must have a recurrent connection on
> the output). The pole balancing tasks turned out to require much less structure than was
> thought, which is something NEAT discovered.

Do we know if this is an artifact of the physics model?

Colin.
